summary: The tools folder serves as the primary user-facing entry point for the warpdata CLI and utility suite, exposing high-level commands for environment diagnostics and dataset loader generation. It acts as a facade that aggregates specialized sub-tools into a unified API for developers and data scientists.
responsibilities: Expose user-facing diagnostic tools for environment health checks
Provide automated code generation for dataset-specific Python loaders
Aggregate sub-tool functionality into a clean, public-facing API
Simplify the discovery of utility features within the warpdata ecosystem
